channel.title: Need help with server run.bat
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Okay i got new error:[/size]
[size=14pt][26.11.11 20:51]: Exception in thread "main" Traceback (innermost last): File "<iostream>", line 4, in ? ImportError: no module named random Press any key to continue . . .[/size]
[size=18pt]my run.bat code:[/size]
[size=14pt]@echo off title runerevolutions java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server[/size]

item.title: Need help with server run.bat
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:29, topic:423055”]Make it smaller, your computer doesn’t have enough RAM to hold it all.

-Xmx800m[/quote]

i know what wrong before fixing java i made compiler RAM smaller

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server run.bat
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Make it smaller, your computer doesn’t have enough RAM to hold it all.

-Xmx800m

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server run.bat
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Perhaps try making the number larger? (i.e. -Xmx1800m)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server run.bat
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:26, topic:423055”][quote author=liivapuu13 link=topic=525708.msg3827739#msg3827739 date=1322329988]

someone had this problem yesterday. you are not reserving enough heap space for jvm to use. either dont reserve a fixed amount or reserve more with -Xmx flag

what i need to do?

use that flag

I dont get it, what flag or soemthing?
[/quote]
-Xmx1500m[/quote]
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server run.bat
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“liivapuu13, post:5, topic:423055”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=525708.msg3827736#msg3827736 date=1322329921]

someone had this problem yesterday. you are not reserving enough heap space for jvm to use. either dont reserve a fixed amount or reserve more with -Xmx flag

what i need to do?

use that flag
[/quote]

I dont get it, what flag or soemthing?[/quote]
-Xmx1500m

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server run.bat
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

[quote=“lemme_winks_, post:20, topic:423055”][quote author=liivapuu13 link=topic=525708.msg3827819#msg3827819 date=1322333232]

java <args>

an example:

java -cp <classpath> <main class>

a better example:

java -cp . Main

would you like to send me full run.bat code for PI server i rep++

i dont have a pi server you are going to have to learn how to use javac

try javac -help

i have no idea what javac -help is
[/quote]
this may help you: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/tooldocs/windows/javac.html[/quote]

got it work with your help but when its loaded the shit then there came new error :S

Read full topic

[quote=“lemme_winks_, post:6, topic:423055”][quote author=liivapuu13 link=topic=525708.msg3827739#msg3827739 date=1322329988]

someone had this problem yesterday. you are not reserving enough heap space for jvm to use. either dont reserve a fixed amount or reserve more with -Xmx flag

what i need to do?

use that flag

I dont get it, what flag or soemthing?
[/quote]
the -Xmx flag read my first post[/quote]

still dont get it can you fix tht compiler code ill rep++

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
